SEARCH
Package com.project.RabbitRun.object

Class SuperObject

java.lang.Object
com.project.RabbitRun.object.SuperObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
ObjBonusReward, ObjExitDoor, ObjPunishment, ObjReward
public class SuperObject extends Object
Represents a generic game object in the "Rabbit Run" game. This class serves as a superclass for various objects that appear on the game board, including rewards, punishments, and obstacles.

  • Constructor Details

    • SuperObject

      public SuperObject()
      Default constructor for creating a generic game object. This constructor initializes an instance of SuperObject without setting any specific properties such as name or image path. It is typically used when properties will be set later through setter methods.

    • SuperObject

      public SuperObject(String name, String path)
      Constructs a SuperObject with the specified name and image path. This constructor initializes the game object with a name for identification and an image path to load its associated visual representation.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the game object, typically used for identification.
      path - The path to the image resource representing the object.
      Throws:
      ImageLoadingException - if the image cannot be loaded.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2, GamePanel gamePanel)
      Draws the object on the game screen if it is within the visible screen area.
      Parameters:
      g2 - the Graphics2D context used for drawing
      gamePanel - the game panel containing the game state and player information

    • loadImage

      public void loadImage(String path)
      Helper method to load an image and include the path in exceptions.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the image to load.
      Throws:
      ImageLoadingException - If the image cannot be loaded.
